summary: This bill, H.R. 4348, reauthorizes the Kay Hagan Tick Act. It amends sections of the Public Health Service Act related to vector-borne diseases, specifically addressing the National strategy and regional centers of excellence, and enhancing support for health departments. The bill updates funding authorization periods from 2021-2025 to 2026-2030, aiming to improve capacity for disease identification, prevention, and response.
